mapper.select: SELECT id, ad_push_detail_id, date, day_cost, day_earn, regist_num FROM t_ad_push_cost WHERE ad_push_detail_id = #{adPushDetailId};
SELECT id, ad_push_detail_id, date, day_cost, day_earn, regist_num FROM t_ad_push_cost WHERE date = #{date} AND ad_push_detail_id = #{adPushDetailId} AND del_flag = '0';
SELECT id, ad_push_detail_id, date, day_cost, day_earn, regist_num FROM t_ad_push_cost WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ad_push_cost( id, ad_push_detail_id, date, day_cost, day_earn, regist_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{adPushDetailId}, #{date}, #{dayCost}, #{dayEarn}, #{registNum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ad_push_cost SET date = #{date}, day_cost = #{dayCost}, day_earn = #{dayEarn}, regist_num = #{registNum}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
